Total Time: 60 minutes
 
 Category: Dinner
 
 Serving Size: 6
 
 Ingredients:
 2 (30 oz.) jars spaghetti sauce
 2 lbs. lean ground beef
 2 eggs
 3/4 cup breadcrumbs
 1/4 cup parsley
 1 garlic clove, minced
 1/2 tsp. salt
 1/4 cup parmesan cheese 
 1 lb. spaghetti
 

Instructions:
 1. Place sauce in a large saucepan and simmer over medium heat
 2. In large bowl mix beef, eggs, crumbs, parsley, garlic, salt and Parmesan 
 3. Shape into 18 meatballs. Place in simmering sauce
 4. When sauce returns to a simmer, cover and cook 30-35 minutes till cooked through.
 5. Serve sauce and meatballs over warm spaghetti.
